Translations.Text: Ini: "ur ksibe$ i iman iw, aba$uo ne$ vveoo, kkes ed ayen Irad Oebbi. Lemmer ssine$ tabavnit, ad owu$ lxio, ur iyi ipnal ixmio. Nek d aneddao kan, u d abcir, i ugdud iumnen

D Neppa ikwen id Ixelqen si yiwen n yiman. Iddem ed segs tameiiut is, ad izde$ yides. Mi insa yides, tebbwi tadist tafessast; telea yis. Mi d teubee eeayet, naaoen Oebbi: "a Mass nne$! Ma Tefkiv a$ d aaeovi, war ccekk, a nili seg wid isnemmiren
Mi sen d Ifka aaeodi, rran aS icriken s wayen i sen d Ifka. I aalay Oebbi, sennig wayen pcaraken
Day ad carken ayen ur nexliq acemma, u d nitni i ipwaxelqen
Ur zmiren a ten aiwnen, ne$ ad aiwnen iman nnsen
Ma tnecdem ten ar nnhaya, ur teddun yidwen. Iauva fellawen ma tnecdem ten, ne$ ma tessusmem
S tidep, wigi tnaaoem, war Oebbi, d imdanen am kunwi. Naaret pen, ma ad awen d rren, maday tessawalem tidep

Day saan ivaoen, ad leun fellasen, ne$ saan ifassen, ad ddmen yissen, ne$ saan allen, ad walin yisent, ne$ saan imeeeu$en, ad slen yissen. Ini: "naaret icriken nnwen, sinna, andit iyi. Ur iyi sganayet
